column3: Order your companion to follow you.
Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.
Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the **Defender** skill tree.
Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the **Attacker** skill tree.
Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the **Healer** skill tree.
